text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan…? You haven't changed out of your performance outfit yet?…It looks like your fastener got caught. Do you need help getting it loose?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah! Sorry about that! But no, it's not that, I just feel like I'm on cloud nine!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Err… I can't really explain it… The view from the stage was amazing…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …It was, wasn't it? …I hope to one day see it again, with you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …! Yes, one day! Of course, I'd love to see it again with…!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hey hey hey! What do you two think you're doing lazing around!? We have to hurry up and get over there! Do you hear me, hurry up!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: If we don't get there soon, the after party will start without us!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Woah…! There's so much delicious food here…!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Spe, you didn't know…? Afterparties are also known by a different name, stomach-low. In other words, due to the weight of the food one's stomach begins to sink. Such a horrible thing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: To be able to say such unsubstantiated things without any hesitation… I'm quite impressed…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh you! To be praised by an upstanding young lady such as McQueen, Golshi-chan is just so utterly delighted☆

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! I'll be sure to take some of the sweets off of McQueen's plate to make sure she doesn't eat too much!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Th-That is unnecessary! I'll show you that we of the Mejiro Family have perfect self control.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Umm… Anyways… Why don't we get some food? Spe-chan?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hmm, Scarlet? Aren't you gonna go get some food…?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hmm…? I'll get some in a bit… Just leave me alone for a second…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey now… Jeez… You honor students are way too uptight. Guess I've got no choice… Wait here for a sec!!
